text: Saint-Sauveur-de-Flée is a former commune. It is in Pays de la Loire in the Maine-et-Loire department in west France. On 15 December 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Segré-en-Anjou Bleu.Arrêté préfectoral 28 September 2016 In 2019, 319 people lived there. == References == Category:Former communes in Maine-et-Loire
title: Saint-Sauveur-de-Flée
